Package uniandes.cupi2.album.world

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniandes.cupi2.album.world.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a card in the album.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player​(int pShirtNumber,
              java.lang.String pName,
              Player.Position pPosition,
              int pBirthYear,
              double pHeight,
              double pWeight)
        Constructs a new player.
        post: Player's shirt number, name, position, birth year, height, and weight were initialized with the values given by the parameters.
        Parameters:
        pShirtNumber - Shirt number of the player. pShirtNumber > 0.
        pName - Player's name. pName != null && pName !="".
        pPosition - New player position.pPosition belongs to {Position.GOALKEEPER, Position.DEFENDER,Position.WINGER,Position.STRIKER, Position.UNKNOWN}.
        pBirthYear - Player's birth year. pBirthYear > 0.
        pHeight - New player height. pHeight > 0.
        pWeight - New player weight. pWeight > 0.

        public int getShirtNumber​()

      • modifyPlayer

        public void modifyPlayer​(int pShirtNumber,
                         java.lang.String pName,
                         Player.Position pPosition,
                         int pBirthYear,
                         double pHeight,
                         double pWeight)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Modifies an existing player.
        post: If he doesn't already have a card, the player's shirt number, name, position, birth year, height, and weight were modified with the values given by the parameters.
        Parameters:
        pShirtNumber - Shirt number of the player. pShirtNumber > 0.
        pName - Player's name. pName != null && pName !="".
        pPosition - New player position.pPosition belongs to {Position.GOALKEEPER, Position.DEFENDER,Position.WINGER,Position.STRIKER, Position.UNKNOWN}.
        pBirthYear - Player's birth year. pBirthYear > 0.
        pHeight - New player height. pHeight > 0.
        pWeight - New player weight. pWeight > 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the player already has a card.

      • pasteCard

        public void pasteCard​()
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Pastes the player's card.
        post: If the card didn't already exist, a card of type PLAYER was initialized with the name of the corresponding image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the card was already pasted.

      • hasCard

        public boolean hasCard​()
        Checks to see if the player has an existing card.
        Returns:
        True if the card exists, false if the card doesn't exist.

      • changeFavorite

        public void changeFavorite​()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Changes the status of favorite for a player card.
        post: If the card was a favorite, it changes to not being a favorite and vice versa.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there is no player card pasted.
